text: On 21 January 2022, an airstrike hit a prison in Saada, Yemen. It killed at least 100 people and injured more than 200 others. Fighter jets from the Saudi military coalition bombed a makeshift prison in Saada province, killing at least 87 prisoners. Those injured in the attack are still being rescued. ==References== Category:2022 disasters in Asia Category:2020s in Yemen Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2022 Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in Asia Category:January 2022 events
title: Saada prison airstrike
